result.purpose: Responsible for managing and scheduling cron jobs, including task definitions and monitoring.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, organizing files by functionality related to cron job management and scheduling.

internal/services/cron-jobs/config.go.purpose: Configuration structures for cron jobs and related services.

internal/services/cron-jobs/job.go.purpose: Manages and registers scheduled tasks for cron jobs.

internal/services/cron-jobs/metrics.go.purpose: Defines and registers Prometheus metrics for cron job monitoring.

internal/services/cron-jobs/scheduler.go.purpose: This file implements a cron job scheduler service with logging and monitoring capabilities.

internal/services/cron-jobs/task.go.purpose: Defines cron job tasks for crawling quest data in a gaming service.

internal/services/cron-jobs/task_collect.purpose: Defines data structures and functions for handling marketplace collection data in cron jobs.

internal/services/cron-jobs/task_games.g.purpose: Defines a cron job task for tracking classic game played activities.

internal/services/cron-jobs/task_mkp.go.purpose: Defines a task for crawling purchase history of Axie NFTs from a marketplace.

internal/services/cron-jobs/task_mvh.go.purpose: Defines a task for crawling console games and managing related data.
